value.fullName: Copy of Development agreement by which the Builder acquired the Development Rights
value.label: Copy of Development agreement by which the Builder acquired the Development Rights

value.fullName: Copy of Power of Attorney given by the Land Owner
value.label: Copy of Power of Attorney given by the Land Owner

value.fullName: All the copies of previous title chain agreements
value.label: All the copies of previous title chain agreements

value.fullName: Latest Property Card / 7/12 extract (not more than 6 months old)
value.label: Latest Property Card / 7/12 extract (not more than 6 months old)

value.fullName: Title certificate issued by the Builder's Lawyer
value.label: Title certificate issued by the Builder's Lawyer

value.fullName: ROC search if the Builder is a private limited company
value.label: ROC search if the Builder is a private limited company

value.fullName: Copy of NA order if the land is agricultural land
value.label: Copy of NA order if the land is agricultural land

value.fullName: Copy of ULC order passed by the Collector
value.label: Copy of ULC order passed by the Collector

value.fullName: Zone certificate shall be required (may be residential/commercial/industrial/IT)
value.label: Zone certificate shall be required (may be residential/commercial/industrial/IT)

value.fullName: IOD (Intimation of Disapproval)
value.label: IOD (Intimation of Disapproval)

value.fullName: Commencement Certificate
value.label: Commencement Certificate

value.fullName: Environmental clearance certificate
value.label: Environmental clearance certificate

value.fullName: The requisite NOC/permissions from MHADA, CIDCO, MMRDA, Collector as per the transaction and if the land is leasehold land of these authorities
value.label: The requisite NOC/permissions from MHADA, CIDCO, MMRDA, Collector as per the transaction and if the land is leasehold land of these authorities

value.fullName: In JVPD transactions, need to see whether the parent society has granted redevelopment permission
value.label: In JVPD transactions, need to see whether the parent society has granted redevelopment permission

value.fullName: Pollution Control Board permission
value.label: Pollution Control Board permission

value.fullName: Fire Brigade Department Permission
value.label: Fire Brigade Department Permission

value.fullName: Permission of Airport Authority of India if the height of the building exceeds prescribed limits (varies by area)
value.label: Permission of Airport Authority of India if the height of the building exceeds prescribed limits (varies by area)

value.fullName: Sanctioned plans approved by the respective Municipal Corporation
value.label: Sanctioned plans approved by the respective Municipal Corporation

value.fullName: If it is an SRA project, all the details with respect to the Rehab component and Free Sale component
value.label: If it is an SRA project, all the details with respect to the Rehab component and Free Sale component

value.fullName: All other permissions required as per the CC conditions and IOD conditions
value.label: All other permissions required as per the CC conditions and IOD conditions
